body: @Orusen-chan yeah heard about the story on Tik-Tok. Girl rejected a popular kid so the kid got a group of friends and kidnapped her and rape and beat her up, burned her skin a couple of times, made her eat glass (I think) and she eventually died from internal bleeding. Most of the boys were not arrested because they were never found by police but the ones who were arrested were put in jail. However, because Japan was a sexist country back then, the boys only got a few years in prison and were later released. Really fucked up…
@Orusen Manigo Yeah thats Junko Furata my guy. Pretty fucked up even for me. Though I didn't hear or read about her rejecting a yakuza. That has a sauce btw nhentai.net/g/4248/

This somehow reminds me of a story of a Japanese woman who got kidnapped because she rejected her schoolmate (which was a yakuza's son) and so long story short, 44 days later after being raped and tortured, she died from traumatic shock. Pretty dark story if you ask me.
